definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Thus Euglena shows a diurnal rhythm in the speed at which it moves to a light source.
sentences.chinese: 當眼蟲被放在強光下時，仍能表現出晝夜節律。
